headine: PICTORIAL: Buhari meets APC aspirants ahead of presidential primary
description: The President, Major General Muhammadu Buhari (retd.), on Saturday night met with presidential aspirants of the All Progressives Congress ahead of the party’s presidential primary in Abuja.

headine: Buhari backs southern candidate for president
description: The President, Major General Muhammadu Buhari (retd.), has backed the emergence of a southerner as a president in 2023.

headine: Mohammed wins gov primary, thanks Bauchi SSG
description: State Governor, Bala Mohammed, has been declared winner of the rerun governorship primary election of the Peoples Democratic Party in the state.

headine: Ekiti poll: INEC gets 3,346 BVAS machines, lists eight flashpoints
description: Independent National Electoral Commission would be deploying 10,269 personnel for the Ekiti State governorship election scheduled for June 18, its Resident Electoral Commissioner, Dr Adeniran Tella, said on Saturday.

headine: FCT police tighten security ahead of APC presidential primary
description: The Federal Capital Territory Command of the Nigeria Police Force has said that it has tightened security within Abuja ahead of the All Progressives Congress convention scheduled to hold at the Eagles Square on Monday 6th, and Tuesday 7th, June 2022.

headine: Tambuwal wins PDP senatorial ticket for Sokoto South
description: The Governor of Sokoto State, Aminu Waziri Tambuwal, has been declared the senatorial candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party for Sokoto South.

headine: Southern govs hail northern colleagues on power shift, commend Badaru
description: Southern Nigeria Governors’ Forum has hailed the resolution of the 10 governors from the North backing power shift to the southern region in 2023.

headine: Enugu PDP gov candidate hails Ekweremadu, others
description: The governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party in Enugu State, Peter Mbah, has expressed gratitude to a former Deputy Senate President, Ike Ekweremadu, and other persons who contested the just-concluded primary in the state for their spirit of sportsmanship in his endorsement for the 2023 on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party.

headine: Atiku’s ex-aide Ardo elected SDP gov candidate in Adamawa
description: Dr Umar Ardo has emerged as the governorship candidate of the Social Democratic Party in Adamawa State.

headine: Candidate kicks as Edo PDP holds fresh senatorial primary
description: With the dust yet to settle over parallel primaries held in Edo by the Peoples Democratic Party, more confusion ensued on Saturday over a fresh election for the Edo North Senatorial ticket.

headine: We’ll no longer route sensitive election materials through CBN – INEC
description: The Chairman of the Independent National Electoral Commission, Prof Mahmood Yakubu, says sensitive election materials will no longer be “routed” through the Central Bank of Nigeria.

headine: No one without PVC allowed in my house, office – Singer Mr P
description: Nigerian singer, Peter Okoye, popularly known as Mr P, has stated that people without their Permanent Voters Cards were not allowed into his home and office.

headine: 2023: Akeredolu seeks unity among APC members
description: The Ondo State Governor, Mr Rotimi Akeredolu, has commended the state chapter of the All Progressives Congress for the smooth conduct of the just concluded primary.

headine: Ondo attack: Tinubu donates N75m, seeks improved security
description: All Progressives Congress National Leader and presidential aspirant, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, on Monday, promised to work with Governor Rotimi Akeredolu to bring succour to the victims of the Owo Massacre.

headine: Ondo attack: Condemnation not enough, sack defaulting officials, Catholic group tells govt
description: Chairman, Catholics in Politics and Business has urged government to sack officials responsible for the protection of lives and properties in the country.

headine: Pictorial: Tinubu, Osinbajo, other South-West APC presidential aspirants on consensus
description: The ruling All Progressives Congress presidential aspirants from the South-West and key stakeholders met in Abuja on Saturday.

headine: Consensus: Tinubu, Osinbajo, other South-West APC presidential aspirants meet
description: The ruling All Progressives Congress presidential aspirants from the South-West and key stakeholders met in Abuja on Saturday.

headine: El-Rufai, Zulum, other Northern govs backing South are traitors –Coalition
description: A regional group, Northern Interests Coalition, has faulted the 10 Northern governors of the All Progressives Congress who threw their weight behind power returning to the South in 2023.

headine: 2023: What Buhari told Tinubu, Osinbajo, other APC aspirants at Aso Villa
description: The President Muhammadu Buhari Saturday night met with all the aspirants for President on the platform of All Progressives Congress, at State House, Abuja.

headine: NASS landlords – Lawmakers who have spent 20 years in Senate, House of Reps
description: Nigeria returned to democracy in 1999, Nigeria has had four presidents – Olusegun Obasanjo, Umaru Yar’Adua, Goodluck Jonathan and the incumbent, Major General Muhammadu Buhari (retd.).

headine: Residents deny reported bandit attack on Abuja estate
description: Residents of Jenew Estate in the Federal Capital Territory have denied reports that their estate was attacked in the early hours of Monday.

headine: Shettima apologises for labelling Osinbajo ice-cream seller, Lawan tomato vendor
description: Former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima, on Sunday morning apologised to Vice President Yemi Osinbajo and Senate President, Ahmad Lawan, saying he did not mean to denigrate them.

headine: Makinde’s deputy dumps PDP for APC
description: Oyo State Deputy Governor, Rauf Olaniyan, on Sunday, announced that he had defected to the All Progressives Congress.

headine: How Fayose lured me into governorship race, abandoned me – Ex-deputy gov, Eleka
Buhari agreed to support Tinubu for President – Buba Galadima
Umahi hasn’t stepped down from presidential race -Campaign group
description: Governor Dave Umahi of Ebonyi State has debunked reports that he had stepped down from the presidential race

headine: Ondo attack: Fish out perpetrators, Tinubu tasks security agencies
description: A national leader of the All Progressives Congress, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, on Monday, visited Owo town in Ondo State, where some terrorists attacked a Catholic Church on Sunday.

headine: We won’t vote for presidential candidate above 55 years – Group
description: A group, Nigerian Youth Collective Action, has said that it won’t vote for any presidential candidate above the age of 55 years in the 2023 general election.

headine: Atiku lists ‘national security seven-point agenda’
description: The presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party in the 2023 general election, Atiku Abubakar, on Monday, said national security would be the thrust of his administration.

headine: Defection: Resign or be removed, PDP tells Makinde’s deputy, APC kicks
description: The Peoples Democratic Party, Oyo State chapter, has asked the Deputy Governor, Rauf Olaniyan, to resign immediately, following his defection to the opposition party, the All Progressives Congress.

headine: Only God knows why Fayose dumped Eleka to back me –Kolawole, Ekiti PDP gov candidate
PDP gov candidates to receive certificates of return Tuesday
description: The National Working Committee of the Peoples Democratic Party has announced that the presentation of certificates of return to the party’s governorship candidates will hold on Tuesday.

headine: Lagos PDP aspirants seek fresh Assembly primaries
description: The Peoples Democratic Party aspirants for Lagos State’s House of Assembly have called on the National Working Committee of the PDP to order fresh primaries just as it did for their House of Representatives counterparts.

headine: Northern APC govs have ruined Atiku’s chances, says VON DG, Okechukwu
description: A chieftain of the ruling All Progressives Congress, Osita Okechukwu, has saluted the 10 Northern governors who supported the zoning of the APC presidential ticket to the South.

headine: Controversies trail priest’s emergence as Benue APC gov candidate
description: Controversies have continued to trail the emergence of the suspended Catholic priest, Rev. Fr. Hyacinth Alia as the All Progressive Congress governorship candidate in Benue State in the 2023 election.

headine: Accord Party warns members against illegal primaries
description: The leadership of the Accord Party has warned aspirants wishing to take part in its primary election to be wary of attending any gathering that does not have the presence of the Independent National Electoral Commission as directed by the Electoral Act.

headine: Lawan, Kogi gov yet to withdraw from presidential race as APC convention begins
description: Senate President, Ahmed Lawan, and the Governor of Kogi State, Yahaya Bello, have yet to withdraw from the presidential race,
